data.eml:eml: A new pygmy grasshopper species (Tetrigidae: Tetriginae) from Central India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gupta, Sunil Kumar (2016): A new pygmy grasshopper species (Tetrigidae: Tetriginae) from Central India. Zootaxa 4097 (2): 280-286, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4097.2.10
